    • validIntRange

      Checks if the third parameter is within the range of the first two paramters
      Parameters:
      start - start of range
      end - end of range
      value - value to be checked if in between
      Returns:
      Returns true if the conditions are met

    • toImage

      public static javafx.scene.image.Image toImage​(javafx.scene.image.Image originalImage, javafx.scene.paint.Color color, int[] pixels, int width, int height)
      Converts an array to an image
      Parameters:
      originalImage - Original image to be drawn on.
      color - color for components to be drawn in
      pixels - array containing pixel data
      width - width of image
      height - height of image
      Returns:
      An image with all groups marked on the array

    • drawGroup

      public static javafx.scene.image.Image drawGroup​(javafx.scene.image.Image originalImage, javafx.scene.paint.Color color, int[] pixels, int width, int height, PixelGroup pg)
      Converts one pixel group from an array to an image.
      Parameters:
      originalImage - Original image to be drawn on.
      color - color for components to be drawn in
      pixels - array containing pixel data
      width - width of image
      height - height of image
      pg - only this specific group will be drawn
      Returns:
      An image with all groups marked on the array

    • markImage

      public static javafx.scene.image.Image markImage​(ComponentGroup cg, javafx.scene.image.Image image, int lineSize)
      Marks groups around components in an image
      Parameters:
      cg - the component group to be marked
      image - the image to be marked
      lineSize - the size of the lines
      Returns:
      An image with boxes drawn around groups in the image.

    • markGroup

      public static javafx.scene.image.Image markGroup​(PixelGroup group, javafx.scene.image.Image image)
      Marks one specific group in an image
      Parameters:
      group - group to be marked
      image - image to be drawn upon
      Returns:
      an image with only one group marked.

      Draws a marker on the image at a coordinate
      Parameters:
      image - image to be drawn
      x - x coordinate of point
      y - y coordinate of point
      Returns:
      image with mark applied to it

    • compareRGB

      public static boolean compareRGB​(javafx.scene.paint.Color color1, javafx.scene.paint.Color color2, double tolerance)
      Comparison method that returns a boolean based on the similarity of two colours
      Parameters:
      color1 - First colour
      color2 - Second colour
      tolerance - the amount of tolerance when comparing the two colours
      Returns:
      A boolean based on who similar the colours are
